dict.acceptation: 俘获；夺取；夺得；引起（注意、想像、兴趣）；
捕获；占领；捕获物；[计算机]捕捉；

sent.orig: We can capture a butterfly, at night can capture a firefly!
sent.trans: 我们可以捉蝴蝶，在晚上还可以捉萤火虫呢！

sent.orig: It provides capture, axis, auxiliary lines and other Methods: To capture accurate point.
sent.trans: 它提供捕捉，极轴，辅助线等多种精确点捕捉方法。

sent.orig: Is the capture hardware properly configured? Check the switch settings and jumpers on the capture device.
sent.trans: 捕获硬盘配置是否正确？请检查捕获设备的开关设置和跳线。

sent.orig: Can set up procedures to capture information in the background, or continuous capture for analysis.
sent.trans: 可以设定程序在后台进行信息捕获，或者持续的捕获以便进行分析。

sent.orig: The general issued an order to capture the hill to all personnel.
sent.trans: 将军对所有人员下达了夺取那个山头的命令。
